data.name: Tommy Gun Carnage
data.detailed_description:
A colorful twin-stick shooter with hordes of enemies,
powerups, perks and diverse environments!

ğŸ”« Use your trusty Tommy Gun to mow down all enemies!

ğŸš€ Every 100 kills a powerup where you shoot rockets instead is activated!

ğŸ’¥ Fun powerups - freeze the crowds, nuke them, shoot fireballs, shield yourself..plenty to do!

ğŸ†™ Perks! Tommy Gun Carnage has some light RPG elements, where every session you gain XP and can improve some stats!

ğŸ”¢ Scoreboard - challenge yourself! How many points can you reach?

ğŸ“ˆ 3 Difficulty levels - whether you want to play casually, challenge yourself a little bit or fight for your life, Tommy Gun Carnage has you covered!

ğŸ¼ Exciting metal riffs in the background - like a proper boomer shooter!

data.short_description: A colorful twin-stick shooter with hordes of enemies, powerups, perks and diverse environments!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.5 GhZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS 10.12 or higher
  • Processor: 2.5GhZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or higher
  • Processor: 2.5Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
